cgcloud__Tour_Template_Tour_Check__c.name: cgcloud__Tour_Template_Tour_Check__c
cgcloud__Tour_Template_Tour_Check__c.description: Stores the details of the relationship between tour template and tour check, which is used to define the relevant tour checks on a tour.

cgcloud__Check_Type__c.description: Specifies the check type of the tour check.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the tour template tour check record.

cgcloud__Tour_Check_Description__c.description: Specifies the description of the tour check.
